channel.title: I just bought this
channel.description:
I was wondering if this is a good mouse. I bought it for $9 USD (in my currency, 6 pounds). Free shipping of course. It's an optical USB wireless mouse. More information at the bottom. IMO, looks good, is good. Picture:
[IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/15znivd.jpg[/img]
Descriptions:
100% brand new and high quality 2.4G corresponding with ISM(industrial, commercial, medical industry) frequency automatic frequency hoping requirements, effectively avoid the interference between the wireless devices. 2.4G wireless transmission can reach 10m barrier-free distance. Switch between 1600DPI Mouse with "Voice +" and "Voice -" button, no driver needed, efficient for operation Multiple auto dormancy function, unplug receiver or shutdown, etc, keyboard can get into the deep dormancy quickly and save batteries well Built-in MINI receiver, convenient for carry Plug and play Specifications:
Wireless technology: 2.4GHz Wireless distance: 10m Mouse size: 122(L)x76(w)x40(H)±0.5mm Mouse button: 7(including DPI key) Key route: 0.8mm Key force: 70±5g Rated voltage/current: DC 1.5V/12mA Power supply mode: 1 AA battery(No.5 battery,not included) Recommend using alkaline battery

item.title: I just bought this

item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

[quote=“Acorn_, post:14, topic:522322”][quote author=Travas link=topic=640828.msg4317720#msg4317720 date=1371763461]
or you can spend an extra $80 and get this

That’s not a mouse it’s a fuccin transformer[/quote]
Don’t diss it’s the bomb, had mine three years now and it still works perfectly, outlived any other mouse I’ve had. Mine wasn’t that expensive though, only got the R.A.T. 3.

item.title: I just bought this
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

I don’t care about the price.
@Hco: Descriptions:

100% brand new and high quality
2.4G corresponding with ISM(industrial, commercial, medical industry) frequency automatic frequency hoping requirements, effectively avoid the interference between the wireless devices.
2.4G wireless transmission can reach 10m barrier-free distance.
Switch between 1600DPI
Mouse with “Voice +” and “Voice -” button, no driver needed, efficient for operation
Multiple auto dormancy function, unplug receiver or shutdown, etc, keyboard can get into the deep dormancy quickly and save batteries well
Built-in MINI receiver, convenient for carry
Plug and play
Specifications:

Wireless technology: 2.4GHz
Wireless distance: 10m
Mouse size: 122(L)x76(w)x40(H)±0.5mm
Mouse button: 7(including DPI key)
Key route: 0.8mm
Key force: 70±5g
Rated voltage/current: DC 1.5V/12mA
Power supply mode: 1 AA battery(No.5 battery,not included) Recommend using alkaline battery

Read full topic
